text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
The turf 1600m 'Mile Championship'!
My strong rival is surely, that girl...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Yes, the always cheerful mood-maker!
A sprint Umamusume who excels at explosive front-running——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Wow, my heart's pounding.
Please take care of me todaaay!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Aha, you're sayin' chill, right.
Chillhauser, right~!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
I'm, like, totally cap, but
if I chicken out, I can't win!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Today, my goal is to win with bright and explosive front-running,
and go back and chill with the wei!
